name: Global uniques
uniques: [-75]% growth [in all cities] <when between [-10] and [0] Happiness>

[-33]% Strength <for [All] units> <when below [-10] Happiness>

Rebel units may spawn <when below [-20] Happiness>
Military Units gifted from City-States start with [+20] XP
Allied City-States provide [Gold] equal to [10]% of what they produce for themselves
Allied City-States provide [Culture] equal to [10]% of what they produce for themselves
Allied City-States provide [Faith] equal to [50]% of what they produce for themselves

When declaring friendship, both parties gain a [+5]% boost to great person generation
Gain [10] Influence with a [Civilian] gift to a City-State
Gain [5] Influence with a [Civilian Water] gift to a City-State
Enables Open Borders agreements
[+20]% [Culture] [in all cities] <during a golden age>
